the number of sentinels under the new law increased because of the change in selection criteria. from April to December, 1999, many sentinel reporting diseases increased in terms of the number of reports per sentinel. but several vaccine preventable diseases including measles, rubella and pertussis decreased dramatically in the last 7 years. a far greater number of reported cases in the
